original_text: They also attacked the camps of the herders and carried off droves of sheep and goats and camels. Then they returned to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 또 짐승 지키는 천막을 치고 양과 낙타를 많이 이끌고 예루살렘으로 돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: They also attacked the camps of the herders
and carried off droves of sheep and goats and camels
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 양과 염소와 낙타 떼를 끌고 갔습니다
